thread.title: Mary White
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Mary White

author: Mary White
title: Mary White
text: When I wanted to frame my parents wedding picture and announcement after their passing, a friend recommended American Frame. They were amazing to work with and the final product was just perfect, it brought tears to my eyes. They helped me pick the colors and frame that complimented the picture perfectly and was finished exactly on the estimated date. I would (and have) highly recommend the company to others for preserving their precious memories.
